TextView.android:text: Layers feeding estimate for 100 and 1000 birds
Layers water consumption estimate(Litres)-100 birds cool weather

The hot weather water requirement can similarly double or even more. The general rule is that water is needed at least 2 times per gramme of feed eaten.Water consupmtion doubles when the weather becomes hot .Water must always be available. Fresh clean water should be given at least twice in a day,when the temperature rises to 35 degree celcius,it doubles. Failure to wash drinkers each time can lead to mold and bacterial growth and can lead to disease outbreak.
